titleStmt.title: Arguments Pro and Con about the Right of baptizing; viz. Whether it ought to be by putting the whole body under water, or only Sprinkling a little water thereon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
